4. Regulatory Reporting codes (77B) start with the pre-fix 'RR-'
Allowed Values:

If CTR/BTR indicator (Transfer Type) = B (BTR) allowed values are Tag 13C/72
Syntax :
(TI-) Allowed format: TI-/Code/Text
(IC-) Allowed format: IC-Code[/Text]
(SR-) 1 line must be in format: SR-/Code/[Text]
(SR-) Allowed format: SR-/Code/[Text] or SR-//Text
